name: HubSpot
description: HubSpot CRM and marketing platform API integration.

permissions.name: Write Contacts
permissions.description: Allows creating, updating, and deleting contact data.

permissions.name: Write Companies
permissions.description: Allows creating, updating, and deleting company data.

permissions.name: Write Deals
permissions.description: Allows creating, updating, and deleting deal data.

operations.name: Search Contacts
operations.description: Search for contact records by filter criteria or keyword.

operations.name: Search Companies
operations.description: Search for company records by filter criteria or keyword.

operations.name: Update Contact
operations.description: Update an existing contact record by ID.

operations.name: Delete Contact
operations.description: Delete (archive) a contact record by ID.

operations.name: Create Deal
operations.description: Create a new deal (sales opportunity) record.

operations.name: Delete Deal
operations.description: Delete (archive) a deal record by ID.

operations.name: Log Call
operations.description: Log a call activity in HubSpot CRM.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Call properties object containing call details.

parameters.name: associations
parameters.description: List of associations to other CRM records.

operations.name: Send Email
operations.description: Send a single transactional email using HubSpot email template.

parameters.name: emailId
parameters.description: The ID of the HubSpot email template to use.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Message details including recipients and custom properties.

operations.name: Create Task
operations.description: Create a new task record in HubSpot CRM.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Task properties object containing task details.

parameters.name: associations
parameters.description: List of associations to other CRM records.

operations.name: Create Ticket
operations.description: Create a new support ticket record in HubSpot CRM.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Ticket properties object containing ticket details.

parameters.name: associations
parameters.description: List of associations to other CRM records.
